Layout.title: Real Price - Local Deals & Product Finder
Layout.description: Find products advertised by local stores, check prices, and discover deals near you. For shoppers and store owners.

AppLayout.accountGuestMessage: Log in or sign up to access your account and store profile.
AppLayout.accountManageProfile: View and manage your user profile information.
AppLayout.accountManageStore: Manage your store's profile and advertisements.

ImageInsightExplorerPage.title: Real Price
ImageInsightExplorerPage.description: Discover local deals or analyze an image to identify products and find related offers.
ImageInsightExplorerPage.uploadCardDescription: Got an item? Upload its image (PNG, JPG, GIF, etc.) up to 5MB or use your camera. Then find offers for it!
ImageInsightExplorerPage.fileSizeError: File too large. Maximum size is 5MB.
ImageInsightExplorerPage.fileTypeError: Invalid file type. Please upload an image.
ImageInsightExplorerPage.cameraAccessErrorMessage: Please enable camera permissions in your browser settings to use this feature.
ImageInsightExplorerPage.cameraGenericError: Could not access the camera. Please ensure it's not in use by another application and try again.
ImageInsightExplorerPage.alertCameraAccessRequiredDescription: Please allow camera access in your browser to use this feature.
ImageInsightExplorerPage.locationCardDescription: Allow access to your location to find deals near you and optimize store searches.
ImageInsightExplorerPage.locationAcquiredToast: Your location has been successfully obtained!
ImageInsightExplorerPage.identifiedObjectsCardDescription: Objects found in the image with their translations. Use these to search for deals.
ImageInsightExplorerPage.relatedProductsCardDescription: Product ideas found related to the identified objects (based on original names).
ImageInsightExplorerPage.noStoresFoundToastDescription: No deals or stores found for {productName} at the moment.
ImageInsightExplorerPage.productPropertiesCardDescription: Key properties extracted for the identified products (if any).
ImageInsightExplorerPage.analysisCompleteNoDetails: The image was processed, but no specific details could be extracted. You can try with a different image or search directly.
ImageInsightExplorerPage.translationsProvidedFor: Translations provided for: Spanish, French, German, Chinese (Simplified), Japanese, Portuguese (Brazil), Portuguese (Portugal).
ImageInsightExplorerPage.identifiedObjectsToastDescription: Objects identified and translated successfully from image!
ImageInsightExplorerPage.noObjectsIdentifiedToastDescription: No objects clearly identified in the image.
ImageInsightExplorerPage.noRelatedProductsToastDescription: No related product ideas found for the objects.
ImageInsightExplorerPage.noProductsToExtractPropertiesToastDescri: No products to extract properties from. Property extraction step skipped.
ImageInsightExplorerPage.noDealsFound: No deals found nearby at the moment. Check back later or try different filters!

MonitoringPage.title: Price Monitoring - Real Price
MonitoringPage.description: View the average value of products by country based on historical ad data.
MonitoringPage.selectProductCardDescription: Choose a product to see its price data by country.
MonitoringPage.averagePriceCardDescription: Average value of the selected product in countries where it is available (from historical data).
MonitoringPage.noAggregatedPriceData: No aggregated price data by country to display for the selected product. Check if products have ad history registered and if associated stores have `countryCode`.
MonitoringPage.noProductsFoundToastDescription: There are no products in the database to monitor.
MonitoringPage.noPriceDataToastDescription: No price information found for this product.
MonitoringPage.insufficientDataToastDescription: Could not aggregate price data by country (check if stores have 'countryCode').

SuperAgentChatPage.title: Super Agent Chat
SuperAgentChatPage.description: Interact with the Real Price Super Agent for insights and analysis.
SuperAgentChatPage.chatWindowDescription: Ask questions about project status, database usage, user activity, or potential issues.
SuperAgentChatPage.inputPlaceholder: Type your message to the Super Agent...
SuperAgentChatPage.initialAgentMessage: Hello! I am the Analytics Super Agent. How can I assist you today with insights about the Real Price project? This chat is currently a placeholder for a future fully functional agent.
SuperAgentChatPage.agentResponsePrefix: Understood. If I were fully functional, I would now analyze your query about
SuperAgentChatPage.agentErrorResponse: Sorry, I encountered an issue trying to process your request or I am not fully configured yet.
SuperAgentChatPage.featureInProgress: Note: Full Super Agent functionality is under development. This is a placeholder interface.

Auth.loginPageDescription: Enter your credentials to access your account.
Auth.signUpPageDescription: Create an account to get started.
Auth.loginError: Login failed. Please check your credentials.
Auth.signupSuccess: Account created successfully! You are now logged in.
Auth.weakPassword: Password should be at least 6 characters.
Auth.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address.

StoreProfilePage.title: Store Profile
StoreProfilePage.description: Manage your store's information. This will be visible to customers on Real Price.
StoreProfilePage.profileLoadError: Error loading store profile. Please try again.
StoreProfilePage.profileSaveError: Error saving store profile. Please try again.
StoreProfilePage.noProfileFound: No store profile found. Create yours now!
StoreProfilePage.coordinatesHelpText: Find coordinates using a tool like Google Maps.
